Darkfate/Darkfate's troops/Dragonfly/Luzbel:

Darkfate and their troops continued firing. Darkfate typed a secret 
command to Dragonfly who left the battle field.
Seconds after Dragonfly had gone, Luzbel arrived and he joined to his 
group.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Dcoburn was the only one to fire on the Brotherhood right?  I just 
kinda 
> skimmed thorugh my mail so someone tell me if I missed anything)
> 
> Vehement/Unicron/Reflector/Sun Crusher:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron was behind the shield completely long before the plasma 
shots were 
> fired, and they hit the shield not even coming close to Unicron.
> 
> The last of the Brotherhood had gone through the small hole in the 
shield and 
> that hole had closed.  A hatch opened in the side of the ship, and 
the 
> Brotherhood gained entry via the hatch, the entry way closing and 
locking 
> behind them.
